existing_features.title: Set the global default text color to pure white across the entire React app by updating the Tailwind color tokens so that `text-foreground` renders white in both light and dark modes.

Ensure all user-visible text remains white even where components currently apply explicit non-white text utility classes (e.g., `text-muted-foreground`, `text-primary`, `hover:text-primary`, `text-green-accent`, `text-gold`), including interactive states such as hover and focus.

Apply the same white-foreground token update consistently in all active global stylesheet entrypoints used by the frontend build (including both `frontend/src/index.css` and `frontend/index.css` if the project still ships both), so there is no environment-dependent mismatch in text color.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change all font/text color across the entire app to white (global styling/theme)
